settings.text: At GRWN®, nearly 2,300 of the world’s most talented artisans craft ourdiamonds. Leading the industry, GRWN® offers a triple excellent cut onall round brilliant diamonds. As a result, only the most expertly crafteddiamonds earn the right to be placed in the box
